attributes.action: Bring home all our troops home from abroad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Its been far too long that our soliders have been in places like iraq,, to be honest its VERY STUPID why we are still there,,
 
Stop letting our innocent troops get killed,,
Bring them home
PLEASE
We want to see them at home safe again
 
So please sign if you want them back
If u know anyone in the army
Or passed away in the army.
